website_summaries.verdict: Homemade, crisp, fluffy waffles at an attractive price point.
pros: Customers report the iron is lightweight and easy to use
Built-in settings allow for varying results depending on your waffle preferences
We love the tray that catches any spillage
cons: May need a few flips to achieve desired results

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: **do not waste your money**** now rhis item is completely not functional it broke, does not spin, a screw fell off as a part of it melted off. Just do not waste your money on this. Now i wont get my money back but i can let you know is not worth it. It makes good wofflea and has great heat. However i have to give it less starts than what i would like. The cover of the light popped and broke and the little pieces on the attached pic ended up inside the woffle some how this was just after the second use.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this iron BUT
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this iron, but after less than a month the plates coating began coming off in places. I've had it over 6 months now and the iron isn't cooking as eventually as it was in the beginning and suddenly started sticking and not properly cooking waffles every time I use it. Overall, it's not even getting the job done and a waste after only a few short months. I regret this purchase and wish I had listened to poor reviews I read prior to ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Nnahh

customer_reviews.title: Garbage, ordered 2 different times
customer_reviews.text: Garbage, ordered 2 different times. The first waffle maker had the Teflon coating flaking off and the second one arrived broken. Save your money , buy a better quality maker than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Waffle Maker
customer_reviews.text: Great item for Price. It makes wonderful, dark and crispy waffles just the way I like it. Waffle must stay 3-4 minutes to get the best quality and may require more than one flip. It was easy to use. I sprayed it with vegetable oil at first and never have to spray it again. I have no idea what the green light was doing because it stayed on all the time but I timed my waffle and took it out on my timer. Clean up was easy, light soft cloth with dish washing liquid and wiped it down and it is ready for my next use. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: MEDIOCRE AT BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a couple Bella appliances and honestly they are all mediocre at best. The First waffle iron o got never heated evenly so I ordered a replacement and the second one doesn’t work correct either! I bought the air fryer which is okay. But my problem with that is the temperature toggle has too much play in it. You CANNOT dial in accurate temperature setting due to this.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a couple uses..
customer_reviews.text: Bought this waffle maker for my wife for Christmas, we have used it about 5 times and loved the waffles it makes. Today we used it and noticed black spec's all over the waffles almost like pepper. With further examining we found that it was the non stick coding coming off on to our food. The waffle makes is now no longer usable after two months and used less then half a dozen times.
customer_reviews.author: Birdd

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: First of all on my unit the led indicator is usless also it smells every time we use it smells like plastic garbage. Also you can’t take out the grates to clean them so to clean it you need a wet cloth. Also the drip pan doesn’t go all the way out so when it spills it goes onto the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Sabir

customer_reviews.title: not able to bake without using cooking spray.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with baking experience,used oil to prepare surface,did not work,first two were stuck to the baking surface,hard to clean it,for the rest used cooking spray improved quality,for sure should no be advertise as not sticking baking surface.
customer_reviews.author: krystyna szaro

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than 6 months with minimal use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this waffle maker on July 19th, I've used it 10 or less times, and today as I was closing the collapsible handle it just snapped off! I have tons of kitchen gadgets and I'm so careful and meticulous with all of them! I'm so disappointed in the durability!! Update: contacted the manufacturer, they stated that the broken handle was not covered under their warranty. Do not buy this. You will be severely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Saieda Faye

customer_reviews.title: It's just a waffle maker....a cheap, easy to use Belgium waffle maker.
customer_reviews.text: Had one for a couple years and broke the plastic stand, (be careful). Other than being somewhat fragile, it works flawlessly. 1. Plug it in, 2. wait for the green light, 3. pour in Belgium Waffle batter, 4. close the lid and rotate the waffle maker 5. the light will go off...wait 6. when the green light goes on again the waffles are done. 6. rotate the waffle maker back to the original position, and remove a perfectly cooked waffle. A couple hints: let the batter thicken 30 minutes and then adjust viscosity with a few drops of water. Use a spray on shortening to keep the waffle maker really non-stick. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Bike Dad

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.  Not worth any stars.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste the money. It actually cooked good waffles. I only used it three times before the handle broke. A small plastic piece inside the handle cracked and wouldn’t allow me to even open it to get my waffle out. Very hard to clean also. Thanks to amazon for taking it back. Love amazon. Hate the waffle iron.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality and waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, this was a waste of money. After one use it’s not working anymore!....the waffles got stuck everytime and it was loose where the top and bottom of the machine meet.
customer_reviews.author: taznim

customer_reviews.title: dissapointing throw away
customer_reviews.text: I use a yeast raised Belgium recipe, our long term favorite. Needed to replace my waffle iron. and purchased this one. It does cook waffles, it is storage friendly, but it also heats unevenly and the material it is made of is too light. The all metal iron was better. The old heavier irons produce a crispy outside with and perfect texture. This iron does not do that it makes a rather soft waffle uneven in its browning. I wont use this any longer, why go to the trouble and produce an inferior waffle.
customer_reviews.author: milne

customer_reviews.title: Won't Rotate - Brand New
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning it. Out of the box, the rotating handle is stuck and scuffed as if someone else had the same troubles and returned it. Since the handle won't allow the thing to be rotated, it can't be used.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny's girl

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money, find a different waffle maker.
customer_reviews.text: 1. After properly cleaning before first use, the first waffle stuck to the "nonstick" surface like super glue. It required unplugging and cleaning again before the second waffle. 2. The second waffle required about 25 minutes of cook time. The center of the waffle was overcooked while the outside of the waffle was about right. 3. The third waffle required about thirty minutes cook time and again the cooking was incredibly uneven. I would return this item if I hadn't thrown the packaging out. Either way this was a complete waste of money and it will require replacing with yet another waffle maker.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper101

customer_reviews.title: Makes great waffles! Buy it! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker makes great waffles. We had one and loved the waffles it made but when it gave out we bought another waffle maker because it was on sale and we needed one right then. The waffles were just not the same. My daughter who loves waffles wouldn't eat them so we bought another one of these and now my wife and daughter are happy again. I highly recommend this waffle maker!
customer_reviews.author: Holly S.

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, it's fragile
customer_reviews.text: Guys, this really is a great product here. Realize that this is a "starter" iron. Be careful with it. Fired off quite a few waffles this morning with it. Cleaning is a breeze, follow the light, it'll let ya know when to pull them out. Pam is your friend. For the price it's a great way to find out if homemade waffles for breakfast will be a long term thing. Great job here👍
customer_reviews.author: Troy R.

customer_reviews.title: Not one problem. Ok maybe one.......  : )
customer_reviews.text: as long as you coat it with oil or not stick spray it does fantastic. The only problem is keeping waffle mix in the house because everyones been eating waffles like crazy. Clean up is a breeze. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Suppa Fantastic

customer_reviews.title: So far, so great
customer_reviews.text: Used this for three days so far, made about a dozen waffles, and have had zero issues. It's simple, lightweight, easy to store, easy to clean (just wipe it down with a wet nano towel). My only minor (and it's very minor) is that it took a little while (about two test waffles) to figure out the right temperature setting to get the right golden brown my family likes.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Atley Ho

customer_reviews.title: Used for the 2nd time, already defective NOT WORTH the money.
customer_reviews.text: We used the waffle iron for the 2nd time today and the little plastic coverings over the heat / ready indicators have come off. This product is not worth the money. We followed all directions brushing with vegetable oil NOT spray and still the waffles stuck. Also quite the mess with the turning function. NOT EASY to clean! We are past the 30 day refund so are stuck with an appliance we will throw out with this week's trash!Gave one star for each category as you could not give zero.
customer_reviews.author: Norma L. Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Temperamental unit. Powers up at least.
customer_reviews.text: Easy as pie to close it... so long as there isn't a waffle on the griddle. I've tried holding it down, pressing it down, pressuring it down, slamming it down, and it won't go down (sounds bad right?). The thing clicks into position just fine when not in use. When in use, refuses to do it. Cooks well. Not easy to clean. Spray butter and pieces of cooked batter go inside crevices. I wanted a waffle experience, next time I get this way, I'll go to IHOP.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Anza

customer_reviews.title: My wife makes waffles all the time now.
customer_reviews.text: We've tried a few - some of them broke within a few uses. This one is sturdy, easy to use and easy to clean. My wife loves coming up with new recipes. This is the best one we've found.
customer_reviews.author: R Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1st use while cleaning it.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic cracked after first use making it unusable. Threw it out. Will spend money to have something more durable next time. Most expensive single waffle I've made myself.
customer_reviews.author: ItsBob

customer_reviews.title: Beats the heck out of buying frozen stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and makes excellent waffles. With this all you need is a plate, a knife, a fork and your favorite syrup or topping. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy H. Wingard

customer_reviews.title: $20.00 for a great waffle iron that makes perfect waffles.
customer_reviews.text: $20.00 for a great waffle iron that makes perfect waffles. I used the WalMart mix, added water, stirred, placed in the preheated waffle iron, the green (hot light) light went out, and then came back on and I removed the waffles. This thing worked great. Amazon driver delivered my product to some other address on the first attempt so I had to order a second waffle iron.
customer_reviews.author: kurt schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Was unable to use the product, as I couldn’t get the waffle maker to either turn or open. The product cane damage, but was also appeared to be made cheaply. Decided to return product and spend a little more on a better quality product
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Rubalcava

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to some great home-made waffles when the waffle maker arrived. I tried five times to make a waffle with failure. Each time the waffle split in the middle no matter how thick or thin the batter was or how long I cooked the waffle 5-10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Pattim

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate timer/light indicator. Still a decent product
customer_reviews.text: Only gave this a three star because the timer on the Waffle maker is inaccurate. It’s actually undercooked when the light timer goes off which is the indicator used to tell you when the waffle is done. You can leave it on longer just be cautious about the light and pay attention to the waffle.
customer_reviews.author: Mari.Feliz

customer_reviews.title: Will take too long to finish the job
customer_reviews.text: The brand name is good, but this waffle maker is not that good. First of all, it will take too long to cook the waffle, second, the machine feels flimsy and will brake in any time. It doesn't have a power switch button, so you have to unplug it every time when you are not using it . It was OK for the price. Will I recommend it ? no, I'll spend a little bit more money and buy a better quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Firas Ghanem

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. We don’t use it much but it does make decent waffles after you mess with it a couple of times. I don’t really think it’s worth the money though. I wish I would’ve gotten a more expensive one with better features.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa123

customer_reviews.title: Less is more.
customer_reviews.text: I love this waffle maker! Great quality for the price and really easy to use. The only thing I didn’t like about it was that if you use too much oil (as I do bc I like mine crispy) it flings out of the side when I rotate the waffle iron.
customer_reviews.author: hhbgg

customer_reviews.title: Works well aside from quirks.
customer_reviews.text: Unsure how to control the temp. It has a strange plasticky smell when it gets hot. It is not always done when the indicator light goes off. For the price, it works well. Make sure to spray with oil prior to using, otherwise cleaning is a pill.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Most likely a dud product.
customer_reviews.text: The heating element is only warm and cool to the touch even on darkest setting. Took over hour to have one waffle cook half raw. Had to use toothbrush to clean even after using oil (not cooking spray per manual) to make in not stick . Unreturnable since I bought it 2 months ago but opened and used it for the very first time yesterday . I ordered another unit from another brand today.
customer_reviews.author: aashish

customer_reviews.title: Easily overflows, and needs oiling every use
customer_reviews.text: Works great as long as you carefully measure the mix and oil it before pouring the mix in. The drip catcher is alright, but it will get mix all over the sides as it oozes out. About 1 cup of mix seems about right to avoid this. It also absolutely needs a coating of oil or else the mix will stick like crazy, the coating this has is definitely not very non-stick.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Warner

customer_reviews.title: No crispy waffle
customer_reviews.text: I should have read all the reviews before buying this .. matter of fact I’m sending it back to it’s owner ... we’ve ‘tried’ to make nice brown somewhat crispy waffles .. all we get is brown chewy waffles .. I threw my waffles away this morning ... the concept of this maker is a good one but after several attempts I recommend you buy elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wonderful waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: A really great waffle maker, very precise, made my daughter so happy, i am happy because she is eating good flour finally ... but hard to clean, i use a silicon spoon to push the little pieces out while hot water rinsing so the sink and the countertop is covered with water all over the place... but we like waffles from this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Porter

customer_reviews.title: Handle Folds for Storage1
customer_reviews.text: I like all the features! Has temperature control, is easy to clean, and easy to use. Is warranted for two years. Only two recipes included in instruction manual, didn't care to make either one. I bought Krusteaz Belgian Waffle Mix which made great waffles!!
customer_reviews.author: LeLe

customer_reviews.title: Here we go A-waffling..
customer_reviews.text: This was my entry product into the waffle world, and am pleased with the product. Priced fairy, and even got a better lightning deal making it a no brained. Love the fact that the product is compact and easy to store. Easy to use, but have found that timing is difficult to keep consistent, where the light would indicate done but the waffles aren’t quite crisp. Drop tray comes in handy! Fufulling all that it was intended for.
customer_reviews.author: daddy-o

customer_reviews.title: No warning beep when ready or done
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time this morning. Waffles came out nice. Only problem it is hard to tell wich light is on, the seem to blend together. I had hoped for a warning sound when done.
customer_reviews.author: Johannes W. Odijk

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Make SURE YOU USE QUALITY NON STICK SPRAY. Cheap butter ones will still leave your waffles broken inside and stuck to the plates . Kinda hard to clean but makes a great well cooked waffle. Beware the smoke and smell lasts almost forever even though the instructions say they go away. Definitely worth the buy. Use Stainless steel cleaner for top surface
customer_reviews.author: D.Day 4B/4C

customer_reviews.title: Great waffles
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker works very well. The instructions call for watching the lights, but that does not work well. I put it on high and set a timer. The waffles are done in 2 1/2 min to 3 min. My kids love them and we make waffles often on the weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Auffinger

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting much since it was so cheap. But this waffle maker has been so much nicer then some of the more expensive ones I e purchased or used in the past. The waffles were delicious and cooked perfectly. I will recommend this maker to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it for big families just for one or two people!
customer_reviews.text: Well it’s ok if u want a cheaply made one then get this one the green light and red light have plastic caps on them and at first use I made 4 waffles and the green light popped out I don’t know why? Maybe it was to much for it so if ur gonna make more then four at a time then DONT BUY THIS! Not like the ones at hotel’s with free breakfast, it’s not the same... 👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Krystyna. H

customer_reviews.title: Good light duty iron.
customer_reviews.text: It works well and is easy to store. This is by no means a heavy duty machine you would use all the time. It seems pretty likely to break if even slightly abused. But for the money it makes a perfect Belgian waffle. Let it go long. The ready light is very optimistic.
customer_reviews.author: A. TRINIDADE

customer_reviews.title: Love my Waffles
customer_reviews.text: I was on vacation and at the hotel they had a waffle maker like this one. I was missing my waffles so I purchased my bella. I love it! Prefect waffles every time. Easy clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Experiment with food
customer_reviews.text: Made perfect waffles for two days The I used two pieces of ham with whipped eggs in the middle. Today I cut French bread crust off and cut bread 1" thick.dipped in egg/milk . Mix. Perfect. Can't wait to stick something else in like panini.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Sits in a cabinet never used.  Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had an impulse decision that I really wanted a waffle maker and I promised myself I'd use it at least once a week. In total I've probably used it a dozen or so times - not by an fault of the product itself but because I tricked myself into buying something that I didn't really need. Primarily it sits unused in my cabinets next to the sandwich press and english muffin egg sandwich maker of similar fates.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This makes the BEST Waffles!
customer_reviews.text: We liked this waffle maker so much....that we bought a second one as a gift! Cooks wonderful waffles! For best results, use a basting brush to lightly put a little oil on the griddle (don't use cooking spray - it will ruin this).
customer_reviews.author: Angela R.

customer_reviews.title: Now that I have had it for a short time ,I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, but doesn't have an off and on switch. Some times chunks of cooked waffles get stuck. Sometimes when making a second or third waffle the ready light doesn't work properly. For a waffle "once in a while this is good but for everyday use for two or more people try another option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my wife
customer_reviews.text: She swears by it not at it. Must be too good, she's eating a lot of waffles lately.
customer_reviews.author: William Langford

customer_reviews.title: not a bad product
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this waffle maker was to set up and I love that it cooks the waffles so quick I made waffles for a family of 4 in about 30 minutes or less. I just don't like that the pancake mix gets stuck behind the waffle maker and it makes it difficult to clean properly
customer_reviews.author: Denise  S.

customer_reviews.title: Brand new..NOT!
customer_reviews.text: So I just opened this and fresh out of the box in complete packaging discovered we've been sent a used waffle iron that wasn't even cleaned... How disappointing on a Sunday morning
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Makes consistent waffles every time
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me, Use PAM or equivalent just before pouring batter. Make sure it is at full temperature before pouring batter. (I use Krusteze waffle mix) It takes 4 to 5 minutes per waffle.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A., Philadelphia, PA

customer_reviews.title: Nice low budget waffles
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use waffle maker. Longest lasting one i had and always keeps the temperature. Only downside if that cleanup may be a hassle depending on the overflow mess. Other than that.. Very good waffle maker on a budget
customer_reviews.author: Bsingh24

customer_reviews.title: Great, but hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: We have loved our waffle maker. The only issue I have is that it is very difficult to clean. Once we learned how much batter to put in it so it would not overflow, it made it much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love making savory and sweet waffles. I have owned several waffle makeres, but this one is the most inexpensive and best one. Waffles don't stick and turn out perfect each time. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Johnna Gray

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I gave Bella several weeks now to respond to my support email. They never responded so I'll go ahead and proceed with a poor review. This product does a great job...except for when it doesnt. If you prefer to do other things while you cook your waffles then pass on this product. You have to stand there and HOLD the waffle maker in its rotate position or it will not hold on its own and go vertical on you leaving a messy sludge of partially cooked batter under the appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 30 minutes and still can't figure out how to open it!
customer_reviews.text: UNFORTUNATELY, I bought this for my mom for her birthday and she didn't attempt yo use it until a year later, when it was too late to return it. At the moment, it's taking THREE adults to figure out how to just open the darn thing! Guess it'll be pancakes. Smh
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: flimsy
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for I guess. Pretty flimsy and cheap feeling; insecure and wobbly. I dislike the plates aren't removable for cleaning, making it very difficult to clean thoroughly. It did make good waffles though. I'll hang on to it because I don't make waffles too often. Hopefully it'll last for a year or so before actually investing in a nicer one.
customer_reviews.author: chelsei

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I had the most wonderful Belgian waffles every morning when I went away, made them myself. I was so enthusiasm to make them at home. I cannot say this is a bad waffle maker. It seems to work just fine. Only that since the plates are not removable like on others, it is IMPOSSIBLE to clean. For that reason, I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All you need for great waffles
customer_reviews.text: This BELLA Classic is well made, easy to use, and is a breeze to clean. The light/dark setting and ready light give you everything you need for the finish product. It also has a folding handle for compact storage. A winner and true value.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Tropfenbaum

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY  Already defective after a few months of using
customer_reviews.text: The indicator buttons on this has become loose and fallen out only after a few months of use. Reached out to the manufacturer BELLA and they informed me that they don’t have to part and are not able to assist.
customer_reviews.author: Jeahan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the other reviews before buying this product. Its very wobbly, very hard to clean and there is some rust on the turn part of the handle. Price is okay but not really worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittanywurster

customer_reviews.title: The waffles come out good, but...
customer_reviews.text: the quality of the product leaves something to be desired. It makes great waffles, but after 3 uses (and cleanings with just a damp paper towel) ALL of the writing is gone. Every bit of it rubbed off. The ready lights also don't work. They flicker on and off at random, in no way indicating that anything is ready. I just have to keep opening to check on how done they are. It also takes much longer than other waffle irons.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Scratch

customer_reviews.title: Overall is great.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could take the plates off to wash. If you want the waffles crunchy you'll have to toast half in the toaster. It doesn't quite get toasty. I do like that it rotates so you get an even cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Lights fell out
customer_reviews.text: So this is our second one. The first one was great, lasted almost two years. I dropped it and ruined it. The new one broke on the second time using it. The lights kinda just fell out. It’s not getting as hot to make the waffles a nice golden brown. I wish it held up like the last one.
customer_reviews.author: Krystalyn

customer_reviews.title: Good, just not the best!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this waffle iron a 5 star review, but I just can’t! Our previous waffle iron made such awesome waffles! We thought it was our recipe, but it wasn’t! These are good, but not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed this product. This reminds me of the ones used for continental breakfast at limited service hotels.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Adediwura

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This product is good for the price. It makes great waffles and worked well. However, it is not going to be long lasting. The quality is behind the price. I have had a $50 one just like this and the product was of better quality given the price, however both machines functioned the same, just not sure I will get as long as I did out of my more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Lee Harbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like this waffle maker, but it is very flimsy. The iron itself is good quality but the casing is terrible. Still makes good waffles.
customer_reviews.author: Monique B

customer_reviews.title: Good for a spare but not much else.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that its small. But the durability factor is lacking. I've had it for only a few months and it has fallen apart. Save your money and purchase a better well made one. The button on the green side fell off and it wont even turn anymore. The last waffle maker I had lasted 7 years it was a waring. I think I will be going back to that brand.
customer_reviews.author: A_daddys_life

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend for his birthday. Works fantastically, it's like a home version of the ones at hotels. Had a control so you can choose how cooked it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Willow Barnes

customer_reviews.title: The best waffle maker on a budget!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these I bought from Kohl’s on Black Friday for 3 years. I make waffles for my kids every weekend and it has never failed me. I dropped it off the counter and busted the base a couple months ago. I liked it so much that I ordered another from here immediately. The second one works just as good as the first! Just remember to spray it with non-stick spray before you pour the batter in and you’ll be good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best waffles
customer_reviews.text: Makes the perfect waffle, every single time, and doesn't take very long to cook. I really enjoy this product. Waffles come out big and fluffy. Easy clean up, and it's non stick.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Jones

customer_reviews.title: wonderful. FYI
customer_reviews.text: The trick to this is: lots of PAM and turn the heat all the way up. Batter should be on the thicker side. With all those things, wonderful. FYI: first time trying it was a mess. Second time is a charm.
customer_reviews.author: carlee

customer_reviews.title: Turned out great
customer_reviews.text: For the perfect hotel waffles but made at your own house. It is wonderful and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Juicy K

customer_reviews.title: Its a good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product for the price. It did have some initial problems with some of the coating on the waffle grates flaking off with the first use but amazon took it back and replaced it. It does take some time getting use to how this machine operates but once you figure it out, your golden and the waffles come out wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have a waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom on Cyber Monday to make me waffles with. Did not disappoint! Not only was it easy and delicious but now she even enjoys making them so more for me!
customer_reviews.author: Samm Elric

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Cooks great! But the flipper is already broken. I have to realign the tab carefully each use, which sucks, but returning it would suck more. It is usable
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa B.

customer_reviews.title: Nope it is not a good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it is too cheap materials. The plastic and metal parts are not good. And the turning capability is so easy to fail. I don't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ike Fydone

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing. My grandson was making waffles as soon as we opened the box. Huge waffles and allows us to get creative adding different ingredients to the mix.
customer_reviews.author: zmarshall81

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Item great price no complaints!! I compared reviews and prices of many. This waffle maker works like many we've used in hotels. Love the fact that it has the temperature control to do a lighter or darker waffle based on your preference.
customer_reviews.author: Tabbey L Easley

customer_reviews.title: No service from Bella
customer_reviews.text: One of the light covers broke off on my third use, I contacted Bella and returned an email with all the information they asked for on August 6, I followed with a 2nd email on August 10 .Still no response. So today ,August 13 I called Bella gave the agent the claim number and then he hung up on me ! It is disturbing that Amazon would do business with a vendor that has such poor (or no) customer service.
customer_reviews.author: courtjester

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: It works ok. Have to cook waffles way longer than the light says. The pieces don’t come apart so it’s hard to clean, can’t put in dish washer (obviously not the part with the cord but it would be nice to take off the waffle part and stick it under a faucet).
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kershner

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Made perfect waffles every time. There was a suggestion in the instructions to not eat the first waffle you make which was a little odd, but I didn’t eat the first one nonetheless. Just to be safe. Good waffle iron. Good price. Probably won’t last a lifetime, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Product looks awesome, not commercial grade. It made of lite plastic and feels cheap. No warning signals of finish, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: jaybee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product yet not easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I really like the waffle maker . It’s great for the price and very easy to use. It makes great waffles to the temperature of your liking and preference. The only part I dislike is the clean up. You can’t remove the parts to clean the product all that well. Other than that, it’s great 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hardcastle

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: Hard to clean. If you want the good and professional waffle maker this one is not the right you should buy. This one is just ok...
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ko

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived USED and full of dings and scratches
customer_reviews.text: My waffle maker arrived new in box...the tape looked kind of suspect...after opening my wafflemaker was USED and looked like its been used at a Dennys for 5 years...completely ridiculous and unsanitary to send this to me
customer_reviews.author: Mahal King

customer_reviews.title: Works well, bakes things well, very useful kitchen helper,  but handle broke.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, bakes things very well. Satisfied there, but handle broke in 2 weeks. Still works but Durability of the material used in handle joint at question.
customer_reviews.author: akc

customer_reviews.title: Sorry waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: Purchased waffle maker in February 2020, used it 4 times and the handle fell off today with one of the screw holes stripped. The lid would not stay up in order to pour waffle mix in so you had to hold it up and pour. Should have paid attention to the return window which was only 1 month. Would definitely NOT buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I had given my waffle maker to my son because we don't make breakfast much. But with my granddaughter sleeping over we do. I prefer Belgian waffles and she loves strawberries so it's the perfect appliance. Handle folds up for smaller storage too.
customer_reviews.author: kris countryman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money
customer_reviews.text: It was a good idea in theory. Bad execution. Broke on the 3rd time using it and I cannot fix it. I’m very disappointed in this item.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: !!!SAVE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker was delivered on April 7th this year. The first time I used it went well. The second time I made waffles I had to use more oil in the batter to keep the waffles from sticking. I used it for the third time today and it broke in the handle area. My opinion is that it was cheaply produced. This is the last time I will purchase a Bella brand product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W

customer_reviews.title: Not the best buy
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker is cheaply made. It is hard to handle and I’ve had trouble getting my waffles crispy. Not what I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice, but I wish it didn’t have lots of little gaps cause it makes difficult to clean. Besides that, it’s very good
customer_reviews.author: Juliana with one N

customer_reviews.title: Broke before we could use it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's birthday because he loves making waffles on the weekends. Sadly, it broke before we could even use it. The plastic on the handle sheared off the first time we touched it to get it into the right position. Sooooooo frustrating that something so cheap is being produced and sold. If you need a waffle, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Burned UP And Blew Breaker ON Flip of the switch
customer_reviews.text: Soon as I plugged unit in it started smoking and blew a breaker ? I think it is toast!! Shure wanted a waffle maker to have when grand babies were here , Five Stars on Amazon Means Nothing , My Disappointment 10 stars . Dean Willbanks
customer_reviews.author: Dean W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Makes wonderful fluffy waffles. Used it at least a dozen times and still holds up. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this waffle maker and it is perfect. Easy to use and clean. My 12 year old loves using it and it makes the best waffles! The only complaint is one of the "ready" lights (Green) popped out and will not go back in. Does not hinder the cooking aspect and was probably damaged during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Fraser
